header.title: Designed to carry the load
header.copy: Whether you’re working with a small closet or a dedicated laundry room, doing laundry for a big family or just yourself, LG can help you find the right lineup for your space and lifestyle.

img.alt: A pile of towels sits on top of a front-load washer in a laundry room.

cards.title: Washers
cards.copy: Whether you favor a stackable front-load washer, or a top-load washer with either an agitator or impeller, we have a complete lineup with the capacity, features and technology to do the job, every time.

img.alt: A teenager is taking clothes out of a front-load dryer and putting them into a laundry basket on the floor of a laundry room.

cards.title: Dryers
cards.copy: LG dryers do more than just stylishly pair with your washer. They add a level of convenience and clothing care to help make doing laundry smoother, smarter and more efficient.

img.alt: A woman is standing to the right of an all-in-one washer/dryer with a fitted sheet in her hands.

cards.title: Space-saving solutions
cards.copy: Big job, smaller footprint. LG’s WashTower™ with Center Control® and WashCombo™ save space without compromising on performance and clothing care.

img.alt: LG's Styler Steam Closet sits to the right of an all-in-one washer/dryer and Sidekick pedestal washer in a modern apartment.

cards.title: Stylish add-ons
cards.copy: For added efficiency and convenience, LG’s Styler® Steam Closet uses steam to freshen your favorites, and the LG SideKick® pedestal washer lets you run two cycles at the same time.
